title: any new info on urf or rotation queue?
body: i dont want a link on the rotation queue page i want to know if there has been any information about urf possibly coming or at least a mode on the new rotation queue within the next few days as i think we are owed something for having to play with these f-ing bobble heads.

replies.body:
I personally haven't seen any new news for either U.R.F. or the rotating game modes.

Although recently I did read that the rotating game modes has now been enabled on the PBE for testing. You can probably expect some news on this within a few weeks or so. 

Hope this helps!
thanks for the info man i hope to see rito pull something out of the hat for us. :D
